XenotypeDef.label: fett clone
XenotypeDef.description: Created from the DNA of a single donor named Jango Fett, these clones were grown to fight for the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Created from the DNA of a single donor named Jango Fett, these clones were grown to fight for the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.

GeneDef.label: clone biochip
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a biochip that will grow in their brain as it develops, the creators of the gene claim it is to help keep clones more obedient.\n\nNote: This sets up specific data on clones, designed specifically for them, using it on your own xenotypes is not recommended.
